item.title: time is not valve time
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
don’t know who made it but, there are that meany themes in BM, look at the areas you go through.
also side note I found this here https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/VideoGame/BlackMesa has some interesting data… but nothing relivent

item.title: time is not valve time
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
It’s missing one critical thing; Black Mesa is a remake of an already highly-successful & above-average game, so very little originality was needed. (And I think he overestimated the number of themes & enemies BM has)

well considering that Black Mesa achieved a lot more than some new games that come out today do… Kept my interest from start to finnish I’d say that if those figures are correct software companies should start firing

item.title: time is not valve time
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
No offense but this is a nonsense comparison.

And no discredit to BMS or Valve but when you think Valve built the engine from the ground up this thing you have posted ignores the obvious fact.

But still interesting I guess. And Valve took a long time between HL1 and HL2
